(โพนพิสัย) is a village in
Buses leave regularly for Phon Phisai from the
bus terminal, as well as other nearby cities throughout the Isaan region.
Phon Phisai village is small, so it is easy to walk across town.  Tuk-tuks can also be found, usually idling near the bus depot.

On the last day of Buddhist lent, usually around October, Phon Phisai is a great spot to watch the Mekong fireballs.  These strange fiery balls of unknown origin attract large crowds of visitors each year.
